But 18% of farms have no access to the internet.

Many employers only accept online applications, reducing job opportunities.

And if you can‚Äôt apply for jobs online, you certainly can‚Äôt telework.

Hospitals are closing in rural America, making it harder to access health care.

But without internet, telehealth isn‚Äôt an option.

For students, study materials, assignments, and tests have shifted online.
